attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I DECLAIRE TO BRING OUR TROOPS HOME U SAY U WANT PEACE BUT WE ARE A NATION IN 2 WARS HOW CAN WE CREATE PEACE WHEN THIS IS HAPPENING WE HAVE GONE TO FIGHT THE TALIBAN BUT WE ARE THE ONES WHO TRAINED THEM ALONG SIDE THE AMERICAINS IN THE EARLY 80'S WHEN THEY WHERE AT WAR WITH THE RUSSIANS HOW WOULD YOU FILL IF ONE OF YOUR CHILDREN WENT TO WAR.I NO HOW IT FILLS ITS LIKE BEING STABBED IN THE HEART AND NEVER KNOWING WHAT YOUR LAST WORDS WILL BE.IT WOULD BE BETTER OT BRING OUR TROOPS HOME AND HAVE THEM GARDING OUR SHORES AND INSTALLATIONS AND CITES THAT IS WHAT WE PAY OUR TAXES FOR AND WE SHOULD CLOSE OUR BORDERS U ARE MORE WORRIED ABOUT WHAT AMERICA WILL SAY IF WE DROP OUT BUT U SHOULD BE FOCUSING ON OUR NATIONS INTREST SUCH AS DESTROYING HOME GROWN TERRORIST AND.GLOBAL WARMING AND POLUTION BUT U ARE THE ONE MAKING IT WORSE BY USEING BOMBS,GUNS AND USING TRANSPORT TO SEND TROOPS ABROAD YOUR A HYPOCRIT
IF YOU CARE FOR FAMILES LIKE ME AND YOU HAVE A HEART THEN YOU WOULD BRING THEM HOME

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
